page.title: 02MORE ABOUT CLOCK FACE
page.content: Clock Face has a small shopping area which is situated near the Clock Face Bridge. There is also a small factory which makes 'Clock Face Crisps'. There is a hotel called the 'Clock Face Hotel' which was first opened in 1775. Clock Face has one main road through the area from which many side roads run. This main road runs into beautiful countryside. This road is a very busy road because it is the main road to Warrington. There are many amenities in Clock Face such as playing areas, a football ground that may be used by any local team and a cricket ground. There are also tennis courts. From Clock Face we can see several different views. From one side we can see the Sutton Manor Colliery pit-head and from another farmers' fields and from another Bold Power Station.
